General.Name: Monarch Casino & Resort Inc
General.Description: Monarch Casino & Resort, Inc., through its subsidiaries, owns and operates the Atlantis Casino Resort Spa, a hotel and casino in Reno, Nevada. It also owns and operates the Monarch Casino Resort Spa Black Hawk in Black Hawk, Colorado. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Reno, Nevada.
General.Address: 3800 South Virginia Street, Reno, NV, United States, 89502
